FuncDef: This command specifies 16-byte opaque data HEX string to be inserted in NSH meta-data (with MD-Type set to 1). The opaque data can also be provided (overridden) by AAA server. AAA server has precedence over static configuration. Theopaque-dataandinsert-subscriber-idcommands are mutually exclusive

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the HEX string up to 32 characters.
